# Zig Development Setup on WSL

This repository documents my Zig installation and development environment on WSL.

## Installation Steps

1. **Install Zig**:
```bash
wget https://ziglang.org/builds/zig-linux-x86_64-0.14.0-dev.3258+d2e70ef84.tar.xz
tar -xf zig-linux-x86_64-0.14.0-dev.3258+d2e70ef84.tar.xz
sudo mv zig-linux-x86_64-0.14.0-dev.3258+d2e70ef84 /opt/zig
echo 'export PATH="/opt/zig:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
# Verify command
zig version
# Should display zig-linux-x86_64-0.14.0-dev.3258+d2e70ef84
# To configure with the my_config repository, add /opt/zig to ADDITIONAL_PATHS variable.
```
